text:
[Verse]
Golden skies fading slow
I watched the colors glow
Night is creeping in the air
City lights everywhere

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the twilight breeze
Memories rustling through the trees
Laughter echoes in the dark
Fireflies begin their spark

[Chorus]
Oh the sunset dreams tonight
Painting skies in shades of light
Hold my heart just one more time
In this moment so divine

[Verse 3]
Stars appear in velvet sky
Wishes on the brink of night
Lost in dreams of times gone by
Listening to the world's soft sigh

[Bridge]
Melodies of evening's song
Tell me where do we belong
Here beneath the cosmic sea
Floating in serenity

[Chorus]
Oh the sunset dreams tonight
Painting skies in shades of light
Hold my heart just one more time
In this moment so divine
title: Sunset Dreams
